price: Ne seront pas égaux les gens du Feu et les gens du Paradis. Les gens du Paradis sont eux les gagnants.
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَوِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yastawī aṣḥābu al-nāri wa-aṣḥābu al-janati aṣḥābu al-janati humu al-fāizūna
